0.question:
Dr Fox and Adam Werritty took luxury stays in Hong Kong and Dubai while  on Government trips . 
Questions surface over how Werritty could afford first-class jet-set lifestyle . 
Werritty offered Sri Lankan regime help to buy arms while on a trip with Dr Fox, say officials 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
Urgent demands for parliamentary watchdog to be called in for investigation 
(b) 
Urgent demands for parliamentary watchdog to be called in for investigation because of the unethical behavior exhibited by Dr Fox and Adam Werritty.
0.target_answer: Urgent demands for parliamentary watchdog to be called in for investigation

1.question:
Which is more likely?
(a) Life imitates art: Tyson had tiger stolen in The Hangover 
(b) Life imitates art: Tyson had tiger stolen in The Hangover because it makes for a more captivating and exciting story.
1.target_answer: Life imitates art: Tyson had tiger stolen in The Hangover

2.question:
NEW: About 10,000 people join a rally in support of ERT workers, police say . 
"We are in a state of shock.  The news is overwhelming," says an ERT journalist . 
New unemployment figures show another increase, to 27. 4% overall 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
A new radio and TV broadcaster will be set up with fewer staff, government says 
(b) 
A new radio and TV broadcaster will be set up with fewer staff, government says because it will prioritize cost-cutting measures in order to ensure financial sustainability.
2.target_answer: A new radio and TV broadcaster will be set up with fewer staff, government says

3.question:
North Korea is building what it calls a "world-class" ski resort . 
Kim Jong Un "greatly pleased" with construction progress 
Which is more likely?
(a) 
Resort will be open to foreign tourists, says North Korea tour company 
(b) 
Resort will be open to foreign tourists, says North Korea tour company because many international events are planned to be held there.
3.target_answer: Resort will be open to foreign tourists, says North Korea tour company

4.question:
The tour of the official bourbon of the Kentucky Derby explains the type of water that's used . 
Barbados has beaches, sand and the home of the oldest rum in existence . 
The producer of the beer milkshake known as Guinness is the No
Which is more likely?
(a)  1 attraction in Ireland 
(b)  1 attraction in Ireland because it is world-famous for its unique blend of flavors and rich history.
